profileSettings.title: Profile settings
profileSettings.publicDescription: Turn on to make your profile and link visible to others
profileSettings.publicLinkDescription: Share this link so others can view your public profile
profileSettings.publicLinkPrivate: This link won’t be publicly visible until you enable your public profile
profileSettings.identityDescription: Clarifies which name and handle appear in profiles and deals
profileSettings.displayNameHelper:
This name is shown in public profiles and deals.
If left blank, @handle will be shown.
profileSettings.handleHelper: Unique identifier used in links and search.
profileSettings.tagsDescription: Add up to 7 tags that describe the types of agreements you do
profileSettings.tagsHelper: {count}/{max} tags. Press Enter or comma to add.
profileSettings.tagsErrorCount: You can add up to {count} tags

errors.unavailable: Authentication is unavailable in this preview

profileSettings.notificationsDescription: Control which deal events are accompanied by notifications and reminders
profileSettings.pushDescription: Notifications about important deal events shown inside the app
profileSettings.deadlineDescription: When enabled, you receive reminders before a deal with a deadline ends
profileSettings.quietHoursDescription: Delay non-critical alerts during quiet hours

overview.title: Your deals overview
overview.subtitle: Overview of deals by responsibility — what you’re accountable for and what others owe you

invite.subtitle: Review the {entityLower} details below. If everything looks good, accept the invite to start collaborating and keep each other accountable.

invite.nextStepHint: By accepting, you confirm you understand this {entityLower}
